Verses: 1 ikkaariyangal Nadandherivarugaiyil Aseeriyaa Raajaavaagiya Sanakerip Vandhu, Yoodhaavukkul Pravesiththu, Aranaana Pattanangalukku Edhiraagap Paalayamirangi, Avaigalaith Than Vasamaakkikkolla Ninaiththaan.
2 sanakerip Vandhu, Erusaleminmel Yuththampanna Nokkankondiruppadhai Esekkiyaa Kandapodhu,
3 nagaraththirkup Purambeyirukkira Ootrugalaith Thoorththuppoda, Than Prabukkalodum Than Paraakkiramasaaligalodum Aalosanaipanninaan; Adharku Avargal Udhaviyaayirundhaargal.
4 aseeriyaa Raajaakkal Vandhu, Adhiga Thanneeraik Kandupidippaanen Endru Solli, Anegam Janangal Koodi, Ellaa Ootrugalaiyum Naattin Naduvil Paayum Odaiyaiyum Thoorththuppottaargal.

5 avan Thidan Kondu, Idindhupona Madhilaiyellaam Katti, Avaigalaiyum Veliyilulla Matra Madhilaiyum Koththalangalmattum Uyarththi, Dhaaveedhu Nagaraththin Kottaiyai Balappaduththi, Thiralaana Aayudhangalaiyum Kedagangalaiyumpanni,
6 janaththinmel Padaiththalaivarai Vaiththu, Avargalai Nagaravaasalin Veedhiyile Thannandaiyil Koodivarachcheydhu, Avargalai Nokki:

7 neengal Thidankondu Dhairiyamaayirungal; Aseeriyaa Raajaavukkum Avanodirukkira Eraalamaana Koottaththirkum Bayappadaamalum Kalangaamalumirungal; Avanodirukkiravargalaippaarkkilum Nammodirukkiravargal Adhigam.

8 avanodirukkiradhu Maamsabuyam, Namakkuth Thunainindru Nammudaiya Yuththangalai Nadaththa Nammodirukkiravar Nammudaiya Dhevanaagiya Karththardhaane Endru Solli, Avargalaith Thetrinaan; Yoodhaavin Raajaavaagiya Esekkiyaa Sonna Indha Vaarththaigalinmel Janangal Nambikkai Vaiththaargal.

9 idhinpinbu Aseeriyaa Raajaavaagiya Sanakerip Than Muzhu Senaiyudan Laageesukku Edhiraai Mutrikkaipottirukkaiyil, Yoodhaavin Raajaavaagiya Esekkiyaavidaththukkum, Erusalemilulla Yoodhaa Janangal Yaavaridaththukkum Than Oozhiyakkaararai Anuppi:
10 aseeriyaa Raajaavaagiya Sanakerip Sollugiradhu Ennavendraal, Mutrikkai Podappatta Erusalemile Neengal Irukkumpadikku, Neengal Edhinmel Nambikkaiyaayirukkireergal?
11 nammudaiya Dhevanaagiya Karththar Nammai Aseeriyarudaiya Raajaavin Kaikkuth Thappuvippaar Endru Esekkiyaa Solli, Neengal Pasiyinaalum Thaagaththinaalum Saagumpadi Ungalaip Podhikkiraan Allavaa?

12 avarudaiya Medaigalaiyum Avarudaiya Palipeedangalaith Thallivittavanum, Ore Palipeedaththirku Munbaagappanindhu, Adhinmel Thoobankaattungal Endru Yoodhaavukkum Erusalemiyarukkum Sonnavanum Andha Esekkiyaadhaan Allavaa?

13 naanum En Pidhaakkalum Dhesaththusagala Janangalukkum Seydhadhai Ariyeergalo? Andha Dhesangaludaiya Jaadhigalin Dhevargal Avargal Dhesaththai Nammudaiya Kaikkuth Thappuvikka Avargalukkup Belan Irundhadho?
14 ungal Dhevan Ungalai En Kaikkuth Thappuvikkakkoodumpadikku, En Pidhaakkal Paazhaakkina Andha Jaadhigaludaiya Ellaa Dhevargalilum Evan Than Janaththai En Kaikkuth Thappuvikka Balavaanaayirundhaan?

15 ippodhum Esekkiyaa Ungalai Vanjikkavum, Ippadi Ungalaip Podhikkavum Idankodukkavendaam; Neengal Avanai Nambavum Vendaam; Enendraal Endha Jaadhiyin Dhevanum, Endha Raajyaththin Dhevanum Than Janaththai, En Kaikkum En Pidhaakkalin Kaikkum Thappuvikkak Koodaadhirundhadhe; Ungal Dhevan Ungalai En Kaikkuth Thappuvippadhu Eppadi Engiraar Endru Solli,
16 avanudaiya Oozhiyakkaarar Dhevanaagiya Karththarukku Virodhamaagavum Avarudaiya Dhaasanaagiya Esekkiyaavukku Virodhamaagavum Pinnum Adhigamaaip Pesinaargal.

17 dhesangaludaiya Jaadhigalin Dhevargal Thangal Janangalai En Kaikkuth Thappuvikkaadhirundhadhupola, Esekkiyaavin Dhevanum Than Janangalai En Kaikkuth Thappuvippadhillaiyendru Isravelin Dhevanaagiya Karththarai Nindhikkavum, Avarukku Virodhamaagap Pesavum Avan Nirubangalaiyum Ezhudhinaan.
18 avargal Alangaththinmelirukkira Erusalemin Janangalai Bayappaduththi, Kalangappanni, Thaangal Nagaraththaippidikkumpadi, Avargalaip Paarththu: Yoodhabaashaiyile Magaa Saththamaaik Kooppittu,

19 manushar Kaivelaiyinaal Seyyappattadhum, Poochchakkaraththu Janangalaal Thozhudhukollappattadhumaayirukkira Dhevargalaik Kuriththup Pesugirapragaaramaaga Erusalemin Dhevanaiyum Kuriththup Pesinaargal.
20 idhinimiththam Raajaavaagiya Esekkiyaavum Aamodhsin Kumaaranaagiya Esaayaa Theerkkadharisiyum Praarththiththu, Vaanaththainokki Abayamittaargal.

21 appozhudhu Karththar Oru Thoodhanai Anuppinaar; Avan Aseeriyarudaiya Raajaavin Paalayaththilulla Sagala Paraakkiramasaaligalaiyum, Thalaivaraiyum, Senaapadhigalaiyum Adhampanninaan; Appadiye Sanakerip Seththamugamaaith Thandhesaththirkuth Thirumbinaan; Ange Avan Than Dhevanudaiya Kovilukkul Pravesikkirapodhu, Avanudaiya Karppappirappaana Silar Avanaip Pattayaththaal Vettippottaargal.

22 ippadik Karththar Esekkiyaavaiyum Erusalemin Kudigalaiyum Aseeriyarudaiya Raajaavaagiya Sanakeripin Kaikkum Matra Ellaarudaiya Kaikkum Neengalaakki Ratchiththu, Avargalai Sutruppuraththaarukku Vilakki Aadhariththu Nadaththinaar.

23 anegamper Karththarukkendru Erusalemukkuk Kaanikkaigalaiyum, Yoodhaavin Raajaavaagiya Esekkiyaavukku Uchchidhangalaiyum Konduvandhaargal; Avan Idharkuppirpaadu Sagala Jaadhigalin Paarvaikkum Menmaippattavanaayirundhaan.
24 annaatkalil Esekkiyaa Vyaadhippattu Maranaththukku Edhuvaayirundhaan; Avan Karththarai Nokki Jebampannumpodhu, Avar Avanukku Vaakkuththaththampanni, Avanukku Oru Arpudhaththaik Kattalaiyittaar.
25 esekkiyaa Thanakku Seyyappatta Ubagaaraththirkuththakkadhaai Nadavaamal Mettimaiyaanaan; Aagaiyaal Avanmelum, Yoodhaavinmelum, Erusaleminmelum Kadunkobamoondadhu.
26 esekkiyaavin Manamettimaiyinimiththam Avanum Erusalemin Kudigalum Thangalaith Thaazhththinapadiyinaal, Karththarudaiya Kadunkobam Esekkiyaavin Naatkalile Avargalmel Varavillai.

27 esekkiyaavukku Migudhiyaana Aisuvariyamum Ganamum Undaayirundhadhu; Velliyum Ponnum Raththinangalum Kandhavarkkangalum Kedagangalum Vinodhamaana Aabaranangalum Vaikkumpadiyaana Pokkishasaalaigalaiyum,

28 thanakku Vandhukondirundha Dhaaniyamum Dhraatcharasamum Enneyum Vaikkumpadiyaana Pandagasaalaigalaiyum, Sagalavagaiyulla Mirugajeevangalukkuk Kottaarangalaiyum, Mandhaigalukkuth Thozhuvangalaiyum Undaakkinaan.
29 avan Thanakkup Pattanangalaik Kattuviththu Eraalamaana Aadumaadugalai Vaiththirundhaan; Dhevan Avanukku Magaathiralaana Aasthiyaik Koduththaar.
30 indha Esekkiyaa Keeyon Ennum Aatrile Anaikatti, Adhin Thanneerai Merkeyirundhu Thaazha Dhaaveedhin Nagaraththirku Neraagath Thiruppinaan; Esekkiyaa Seydhadhellaam Vaaiththadhu.

31 aagilum Baabilon Prabukkalin Sthaanaapadhigal Dhesaththile Nadandha Arpudhaththaik Ketka Avanidaththukku Anuppappatta Vishayaththil Avan Irudhayaththil Undaana Ellaavatraiyum Ariyumpadi Avanai Sodhikkiradharkaaga Dhevan Avanaik Kaivittaar.

32 esekkiyaavin Matra Varththamaanangalum, Avan Seydha Nanmaigalum Aamodhsin Kumaaranaagiya Esaayaa Theerkkadharisiyin Pusthagaththilum, Yoodhaa Isravel Raajaakkalin Pusthagaththilum Ezhudhiyirukkiradhu.

33 esekkiyaa Than Pidhaakkalode Niththiraiyadaindhapinbu, Avanai Dhaaveedhu Vamsaththaarin Kallaraigalil Pradhaanamaana Kallaraiyil Adakkampanninaargal; Yoodhaavanaiththum Erusalemin Kudigalum Avan Mariththapodhu Avanaik Ganampanninaargal; Avan Kumaaranaagiya Manaase Avan Sthaanaththil Raajaavaanaan.
